title: Expanded Diceware Volumes
blurb: Books of Diceware wordlists, curated in volume sets (languages, themes, profanity filters) for high-entropy, human-typeable passphrases.
description: Expanded Diceware Volumes compiles vetted Diceware wordlists as printable books and machine-readable datasets. Each volume preserves canonical 5-dice indices (11111–66666), includes integrity hashes, and documents normalization/diacritics policies. Generate memorable passphrases with transparent, auditable sources — offline-first.
